Package ohos.wifi

Class WifiDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.wifi.WifiDevice

  • public final class WifiDevice
extends Object
    Provides interfaces to manage Wi-Fi.

    This class provides methods for obtaining Wi-Fi status and information, such as checking whether Wi-Fi is enabled, obtaining the list of information about access points detected in a Wi-Fi scan, and checking whether a Wi-Fi connection has been set up.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WifiDevice getInstance​(Context context)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Obtains a WifiDevice instance.

        WifiDevice is a singleton class.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context of the caller.
        Returns:
        Returns the WifiDevice instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the caller is missing required context.
        Since:
        1

      • isWifiActive

        public boolean isWifiActive​()
        Checks whether Wi-Fi is enabled.

        The application must have the permission specified by ohos.permission.GET_WIFI_INFO.

        Returns:
        Returns true if Wi-Fi is enabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • scan

        public boolean scan​()
        Scans Wi-Fi hotspots.

        The method is asynchronous. After the scanning is complete, the WifiEvents#EVENT_SCAN_STATE notification will be sent, and the getScanInfoList() method is invoked to obtain the result.

        The application must have the permission specified by ohos.permission.SET_WIFI_INFO and ohos.permission.LOCATION.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the method is called successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getScanInfoList

        public List<WifiScanInfo> getScanInfoList​()
        Obtains the list of information about the access points detected in a Wi-Fi scan.

        The ohos.permission.LOCATION and ohos.permission.GET_WIFI_INFO permission is required for obtaining all available Wi-Fi access points.

        Returns:
        Returns the list of information about the access points detected in a Wi-Fi scan.
        Since:
        1

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected​()
        Checks whether a Wi-Fi connection has been set up.

        The application must have the permission specified by ohos.permission.GET_WIFI_INFO.

        Returns:
        Returns true if a Wi-Fi connection has been set up; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getLinkedInfo

        public Optional<WifiLinkedInfo> getLinkedInfo​()
        Obtains information about a Wi-Fi connection.

        The connection information includes the SSID, BSSID, and RSSI of the Wi-Fi hotspot. networkId is the unique ID of the Wi-Fi network.

        The application must have the permission specified by ohos.permission.GET_WIFI_INFO.

        Returns:
        Returns the Wi-Fi connection information.
        Since:
        1

      • getIpInfo

        public Optional<IpInfo> getIpInfo​()
        Obtains the IP information of a Wi-Fi connection.

        The IP information includes the host IP address, gateway address, and DNS information.

        The application must have the permission specified by ohos.permission.GET_WIFI_INFO.

        Returns:
        Returns the IP information of the Wi-Fi connection.
        Since:
        1

      • getSignalLevel

        public int getSignalLevel​(int rssi,
                          int band)
        Calculates the Wi-Fi signal level based on the Wi-Fi RSSI and frequency band.

        The Wi-Fi signal level ranges from 0 to 4.

        Parameters:
        rssi - Indicates the Wi-Fi RSSI.
        band - Indicates the Wi-Fi frequency band.
        Returns:
        Returns the Wi-Fi signal level.
        Since:
        2

      • getCountryCode

        public String getCountryCode​()
        Obtains the country code of this device.
        Returns:
        Returns the country code of this device.
        Since:
        3

      • isFeatureSupported

        public boolean isFeatureSupported​(long featureId)
        Checks whether this device supports a specified feature.
        Parameters:
        featureId - Indicates the ID of the feature to check. WifiUtils provides feature IDs, for example, WifiUtils#WIFI_FEATURE_INFRA.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this device supports the specified feature; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • addUntrustedConfig

        public boolean addUntrustedConfig​(WifiDeviceConfig config)
        Adds a specified untrusted hotspot configuration.

        This method adds one configuration at a time. After this configuration is added, your device will determine whether to connect to the hotspot.

        You need to obtain the following permission before calling this method: SystemPermission.SET_WIFI_INFO.

        Parameters:
        config - Indicates the untrusted hotspot configuration to add. The configuration can use only the Simultaneous Authentication of Equals (SAE) or pre-shared key (PSK) mode.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the untrusted hotspot configuration is added; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • removeUntrustedConfig

        public boolean removeUntrustedConfig​(WifiDeviceConfig config)
        Removes a specified untrusted hotspot configuration.

        This method removes one configuration at a time.

        You need to obtain the following permission before calling this method: SystemPermission.SET_WIFI_INFO.

        Parameters:
        config - Indicates the untrusted hotspot configuration to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the untrusted hotspot configuration is removed; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
